title: 34: No Such Thing As A Giant German Sandcastle
content: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss the scent of a comet, sky girls in go-go boots, the James Bonds that could have been and the most expensive thing Bruce Willis ever bought.
contentSnippet: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss the scent of a comet, sky girls in go-go boots, the James Bonds that could have been and the most expensive thing Bruce Willis ever bought.
